Html:
Hey there, just having a couple of problems creating a style for my University's referencing system. The main issue at the moment is the way that URLs are handled for sorting... at the moment I have something like:

http://www.academicallydodgywebsite.com (2005) (Accessed 1 January 2014)
Grey, G. (2012) A Book. London: A. Publishing Co.
Smith, J. (1980) Old Book. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.

However, the whole URL must be sorted, i.e:

Grey, G. (2012) A Book. London: A. Publishing Co.
http://www.academicallydodgywebsite.com (2005) (Accessed 1 January 2014)
Smith, J. (1980) Old Book. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press.

Of course, nobody recommends such sources but allowances for websites with only a URL are made in the style.
